Package classifier

Class AbstractBayes<T>

java.lang.Object
classifier.AbstractClassifier<T>
classifier.AbstractBayes<T>
Type Parameters:
T - A generic type
All Implemented Interfaces:
Classifier<T>
Direct Known Subclasses:
TreeAugmentedNayveBayes
public abstract class AbstractBayes<T>
extends AbstractClassifier<T>
An abstract class that serves as a possible blue print for a Bayes Classifier. This class stores a DataModel with counts taken from data and Score that can be used to evaluate the data with. This abstract class extends the AbstractClassifier class that itself implements the Classifier interface.
Since:
2020-05-03
Version:
1.0.0
Author:
Marcelo Jacinto, David Souto, Gonçalo Tomás
See Also:
Classifier, AbstractClassifier, TreeAugmentedNayveBayes, Score, MDLScore, LLScore, DataModel, TrainingModel

    A DataModel of the same generic type of the classifier with counts and labels extracted from training data

  • Constructor Details

    • AbstractBayes

      public AbstractBayes​(Score score, DataModel<T> trainingModel)
      The constructor for the Abstract Bayes. Receives as input a Score to be used and a DataModel with countings extracted from training data
      Parameters:
      score - A Score with to be used to calculate weighted between edges in a probabilist model
      trainingModel - A DataModel with counts extracted from training data
      See Also:
      Score, MDLScore, LLScore, DataModel, TrainingModel

  • Method Details

    • train

      public void train()
      A method that invokes the doTrain() method inside. The goal is to train a classifier using the data inside the DataModel object

    • predictOneExample

      public T predictOneExample​(T[] data)
      A method that invokes the doPredict() method inside. The goal is to generate a prediction using the model previously trained and the data received as parameter
      Parameters:
      data - An array of data of generic type. This data should be used to make a prediction
      Returns:
      A generic type with the prediction

    • doTrain

      protected abstract void doTrain()
      An abstract method to be implemented a posterior that trains a model based on the data in the DataModel

    • doPredict

      protected abstract T doPredict​(T[] data)
      Ab abstract method to be implemented a posteriori that makes a prediction based on the model trained
      Parameters:
      data - An array of data of generic type (to make a prediction with)
      Returns:
      A generic type with the prediction
